title: Maggot
summaries: Maggots are critters that replace Worms in the Graveyard mini-biome and fall off of Maggot Zombies when hit.
They cannot harm players. They move and behave similarly to <linked>worms</linked>, and can be used as <linked>bait</linked> with 22% bait power.

It can be caught with any <linked>Bug Net</linked> to be carried around in the <linked>inventory</linked> and released later, or crafted into a <linked>Maggot Cage</linked> to be used as decorative <linked>furniture</linked>. Once crafted, the caged Maggot cannot be released again, and when placed down it moves around inside the cage as it would do outside.

statistics.Sell: 5

result.value: [img:Maggot Cage]Maggot Cage
